import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './AboutPage.css'; function AboutPage() { const [flippedCards, setFlippedCards] = useState({ about: false, usage: false, creator: false, tech: false }); const [hoveredCard, setHoveredCard] = useState(null); const [isDealing, setIsDealing] = useState(true); const toggleCard = (card) => { setFlippedCards(prev => ({ ...prev, [card]: !prev[card] })); }; useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => setIsDealing(false), 1000); return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); return (
